spiritsExplanation:
The title "Power HIIT Row" and the format "HIIT" indicate a "High-Energy & Intense" spirit, focusing on short, maximum-effort intervals. Descriptors such as "sprint and max pace" and an intensity level of 3 out of 3 further support this classification. The energetic playlist, with tracks like "Party Rock Anthem," also contributes to a high-energy environment, justifying a score of 0.9 for this spirit.

Additionally, the mention of "explore Miami" and the image of rowing outdoors strongly suggest an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit. This implies nature-based elements and environmental exploration, earning a score of 0.8. This classification is reinforced by the visual of rowing on water, which aligns with outdoor activities.

The presence of "Drive" and "standard" in the category indicates a focus on intensity and regular rowing practice but does not alter the main spirits identified. Other spirits, like "Flow & Rhythm" or "Soothing & Restorative," were not applicable due to the high intensity and lack of focus on recovery or continuous, smooth movement.
